p: In accordance with PFS subgroup analysis results (Figure 2 and Figure S2), the PFS of the IRI group was significantly better compared with the OX group in BRAF WT, PTEN‐positive, and aCRCS A1 patients. In no molecular subtypes was the PFS of the OX group better compared with the IRI group. In the interaction test, only the aCRCS was a significant predictive factor for the PFS after OX‐based and IRI‐based therapies.
